title: boardlevel concern
extract: concern verb (WORRY) ​ C1 [ T ] to cause worry to someone: The state of my father's health concerns us greatly. [ + that ] It concerns me that he hasn't been in contact.
extract_html: concern verb (WORRY) ​ C1 [ T ] to cause worry to someone: The state of my father's health concerns us greatly. [ + that ] It concerns me that he hasn't been in contact.
